High Priest Raymond:
The guards said that this mage was just passing by. But the girl from the Delegation that was here recently, said that if he was able to learn the subject from the world of Spirits of the Wind, it is not an ordinary mage.
Go to the northeast. The girl from the Delegation went there in search of Skeleton Warriors and Skeleton Archers. These Skeletons have the same subjects from the world of the Spirits of the Wind, like the one I showed You.
Be careful. Let the force be with You light!
